title: IGNITE-11103 Idle Verify --cache-filter ALL should include system caches.
body:
Introduce USER and invisible DEFAULT cache filters.
DEFAULT now outputs all USER caches unless cache names specified, otherwise all that match them, including system.
Fix messages when no caches match filter and --dump supplied.

title: IGNITE-11425: added log information about inaccessible nodes within tcp communication
Ignite-aligne-page
read parameters from the environment if they are not specified
body:
read parameters from the environment if they are not specified

    function setParam(){
    VAR=''
    for PAR in host port user ping-interval ping-timeout ssl-protocol ssl-cipher-suites ssl-key-algorithm keystore-type keystore truststore-type truststore
    do
        varname="IGNITE_`echo ${PAR} | tr [:lower:] [:upper:]`"
        if [[ -n "${!varname:-}" && $@ != *" --${PAR}"* ]]; then
            eval "VAR='$VAR --${PAR} ${!varname}'"
        fi
    done
    eval "$1='${VAR}'"
    }
    ENVPARAMS=''
    setParam ENVPARAMS $@
    set -- "$@" "$ENVPARAMS"

    IGNITE-1174
